item.title: International Conversation Café - New Time and Place - 12 noon at the Community Centre
item.author: office@charleston-church.org (Charleston Community Church)
item.description: New Time and Place! In partnership with Charleston Community Centre, the International Conversation Cafe has a new time and place!

item.title: Cafés for the Community
item.author: office@charleston-church.org (Charleston Community Church)
item.description: ☕ We invite you to join us for a beverage and a blether at the various Charleston Community Church Cafés!

item.title: Drop In Café
item.author: office@charleston-church.org (Charleston Community Church)
item.description: Join us for coffee, conversation, and good hearted community connection at Charleston Community Church Café on Tuesdays and Fridays—everyone is welcome!
